testcase.name: A test enter the number -1 in place of the quantity of the product and adding it to the basket.
testcase.summary: The goal of the test is checking if during of adding of the quantity can enter angry number and how the app will be behave. In this case, it will be an attempt to enter a negative number -1.
testcase.preconditions: As a logged in user of the website https://www.frisco.pl/, go to page product.

step.expectedresults: The meesage is displayed „Choose the delivery place”.
The meesage is displayed „Thank you for providing postcode”.
You have redirected to the product entry form.

step.actions: In the place of the quantity, enter the value -1.
step.expectedresults: When you try to enter -1, a message appears „Product removed from a cart”.
The shopping cart does not display any product.

custom_field.name: Final actions
custom_field.value: Clear a cart and log out.

step.expectedresults: The meesage is displayed „Choose the delivery place”.
The meesage is displayed „Thank you for providing postcode”.

step.actions: In the place of the quantity, enter the value 0.

testcase.name: A test enter the number 1 in place of the quantity of the product and adding it to the basket.
testcase.summary: The goal of the test is checking if during of adding of the quantity can enter number 1.
testcase.preconditions: As a logged in user of the website https://www.frisco.pl/, go to page product.

step.expectedresults: The meesage is displayed „Choose the delivery place”.
The meesage is displayed „Thank you for providing postcode”.
You have redirected to the product entry form.

step.actions: In the place of the quantity, enter the value 1.
step.expectedresults: Changed to 1 at the cart icon.
The basket displays the added product on the list in the amount of 1.

custom_field.name: Final actions
custom_field.value: Clear a cart and log out.
